html: 9.20.17  2:00 am   The 9.19.17  7:43 pm post you made was revelatory. Thank you for that. As someone who connects deeply with your art and is endlessly fascinated with the inner working of your mind, I am fucking thrilled. I am so excited to hear your sound continue to develop. I hope you know how important you are to some people.
